content.text: Without using a calculator, express \(\frac{(5 + 2\sqrt{3})^2}{2 + \sqrt{3}}\) in the form \(p + q\sqrt{3}\) , where \(p\) and \(q\) are integers

respectively. The point \(C\) lies on \(AB\) and is such that \(\overrightarrow{AC} = \frac{2}{3}\overrightarrow{AB}\) . Find the position vector
and the magnitude of this vector

Find the speed of the lifeboat
A coastguard station receives a distress call from a ship which is travelling at \(15\mathrm{km / h}\)

bearing of \(150^{\circ}\). A lifeboat leaves the coastguard station at 1500 hours; at this time the ship is distance of \(30\mathrm{km}\) on a bearing of \(270^{\circ}\). The lifeboat travels in a straight line at constant speed along
reaches the ship at 15 40 hours
